001package com.github.sormuras.bach.conventional;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.ModulePathsOption;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption;
006import java.io.File;
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Optional;
011import java.util.StringJoiner;
012import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
013
014public record ConventionalSpace(
015    Optional<String> name,
016    Optional<Integer> release,
017    List<ConventionalModule> modules,
018    ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption moduleSourcePaths,
019    ModulePathsOption modulePaths) {
020
021  public static ConventionalSpace of() {
022    return new ConventionalSpace().moduleSourcePaths(".");
023  }
024
025  public static ConventionalSpace of(String name) {
026    var patternJoiner = new StringJoiner(File.separator).add(".").add("*").add(name);
027    return new ConventionalSpace()
028        .name(name)
029        .moduleSourcePaths(patternJoiner.toString(), patternJoiner.add("java").toString());
030  }
031
032  public ConventionalSpace() {
033    this(
034        Optional.empty(),
035        Optional.empty(),
036        List.of(),
037        ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption.empty(),
038        ModulePathsOption.empty());
039  }
040
041  public ConventionalSpace name(String name) {
042    return new ConventionalSpace(
043        Optional.ofNullable(name), release, modules, moduleSourcePaths, modulePaths);
044  }
045
046  public ConventionalSpace release(Integer release) {
047    return new ConventionalSpace(
048        name, Optional.ofNullable(release), modules, moduleSourcePaths, modulePaths);
049  }
050
051  public ConventionalSpace modules(List<ConventionalModule> modules) {
052    return new ConventionalSpace(
053        name, release, List.copyOf(modules), moduleSourcePaths, modulePaths);
054  }
055
056  public ConventionalSpace modulesAdd(String name) {
057    return modulesAdd(name, UnaryOperator.identity());
058  }
059
060  public ConventionalSpace modulesAdd(String name, UnaryOperator<ConventionalModule> operator) {
061    var modules = new ArrayList<>(this.modules);
062    modules.add(operator.apply(ConventionalModule.of(name)));
063    return modules(modules);
064  }
065
066  public ConventionalSpace moduleSourcePaths(String... patterns) {
067    return new ConventionalSpace(
068        name, release, modules, new ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption(List.of(patterns)), modulePaths);
069  }
070
071  public ConventionalSpace modulePaths(Path... paths) {
072    return new ConventionalSpace(
073        name, release, modules, moduleSourcePaths, new ModulePathsOption(List.of(paths)));
074  }
075
076  public ConventionalBuilder toBuilder(Bach bach) {
077    return new ConventionalBuilder(bach, this);
078  }
079
080  public List<String> toModuleNames() {
081    return modules.stream().map(ConventionalModule::name).toList();
082  }
083}
